shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye 13 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya magin dakunu palath sabhawa wetha pawari athi balathala anuwa amathyansha, departhamenthu ha adhikari aayathana magin itukarana karyayan nisiparidi ituwana bawa adhikshanaya kirima, ema aayathana wisin diyath karanu labana karyayan sambandhikaranaya kirima, mulya ha bhauthika sampath sanwardhanaya saha manawa sampath kalamanakaranaya kirima, puhunu kirima mehewara karagath dakunu palath pradhana lekam karyalaya dakunu palath sabhawe aayathana paripalanaye kendusthanaya we.

“premaya kimayi” kiyana ekata uththara hoyahoya hitapu mata eka thani uththarekata uththara dahayak withara hoyala genath dunne eya.mama aayimath liyanna patan gaththa.mama gana.api gana wagema panthi aragalayen hembath wechcha manussa aathma gana.eya mama wagema kiyawana liyana kenek wechcha nisa apita api ganama kiyawimak thibba.mata mathakayi eya mata issara liyala ewana kawi mama wenama pothaka alawala thiyagena hitiya.api sathutin hitiye.api maddena ,aththatama mage athule thawa kenek husma ganna patan gannakanma.eya bohoma samanya pirimi lamayek.anith aya wagema meka danagaththama kalabala wuna.me deyin eyata nidahasa denna kiyala magen das wathawakata wada illuwa.ee wesak walata sathiyakata kalin dawasak.mamayi eyayi kampas eke thibba banak ahala pitakotuwe paththe eya danna thanakata gihin eyawa karadarayata path karana pekiniya kapala damma.pothe hatiyata nam mama duk wenna ooni.eeth mata dukak danune na.samahara welawata duka enne duka widihatama nemeyi.eeka kalakirima wage wenas rupayakin awith karadara karanna puluwan.awurudu hathara iwara wela eya kampas eken eliyata giyata passe aayimath mama robarosiya mal watena pare madden thani wuna.

wasara 30k pamana ema karyalaye wagakiwa yuthu thanathuru rasaka ethuma sewaya kaleya. 1954 di 12 wana piyus pap wahanse wisin ethuma milano hi agaraguru thuman lesa pathkaranu labina. 1958 di 23 wana juwam pap wahanse wisin ethuma kadinalwarayaku lesa path kerina.
